channel.title: The SRL "Hotpack"
channel.description:
Greetings all,
Earlier today, I was preparing for the big bang at the SRL forums by downloading the SRL hotpack our dear friend, Fakawi, posted for us developers' use. Unfortunately, I was away for the day and missed the comedy train. Anyways, as I was downloading the SRL hotpack(11% done. I have dial-up), a devastating error occured. I knew what had happened and I knew it was bad. Fakawi had pulled the plug. Now, I don't think I'll be able to contact Fakawi, so I was wondering if anyone had downloaded the SRL hotpack in time and if so, would they please mind sharing it with me.
Thanks all,
Kernel Klink

item.title: The SRL "Hotpack"
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You mean the SRL SVN backup he made? I can upload it for you, gotta boot into windows hang on ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: July 14, 2006, 10:36:36 PM[/size][hr]http://moparscape.netfirms.com/VillaVuRepos.rar
